channel.title: Chrome on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Chrome on PR

item.title: How to install Grease monkey scripts on Google Chrome 21
item.description: Chrome updated its policy to not to install extensions and scripts outside of Google webstore by default. (Gatekeeper, everyone wants to be the police)

item.title: Idea to action: Tile this
item.description: Not many of my ideas are converted to a project, this one has seen its light last week. Though I haven’t completed all the UI and features of my original vision, it is better to have one working idea than nothing.

item.title: RIL2Insta - Import Read it Later links to Instapaper
item.description: One of my long time wish to write a Chrome extension completed last week. It all started when my answer was down-voted at apple.

item.title: Desktop Notification with Html5
item.description: I’ve recently stumbled upon studio.html5rocks.com and found the cool trick to display desktop notifications like Gmail. I thought it is cool, thinking of including it in any of my app I plan to do.

item.title: Play Angrybirds on web (Chrome)
item.description: HD for good configuration computers | SD for little out of date computers For those who wants to see all levels without completing a level or struck in a level, here is the hack, copy the following code, paste it on url textbox and hit enter.

item.title: Idea Vault: Tile this!
item.description: Update: Check the extension and more information @ Idea to action: Tile this I was recently hunting images for a sample design.

item.title: Pure Reader for Chrome
item.description: I love the theme of the Pure Reader for Safari (http://nadesign.net/safari/). I’ve ported the CSS as a userscript to use it with Google Chrome.

item.title: Google Chrome : Hybrid of all
item.description: Webkit as rendering engine like Safari Tabstyles are from Flock Startup page similar to Opera speed-dial and Flock myhome page Paste and go in the address bar like Opera No menu bar like IE 7 Tab-to-window and vice versa from Opera/Safari Incognito browsing similar to Private Browsing Create Application Shortcuts like Mozilla Prism What’s new in Google Chrome No two separate textboxes for URL and for Search Every tab is a separate process Innovative Search, composite of Tortoise Merge (any Textdiff app), Firefox’s (Highlight All) findbox positioned similar to Safari Built-in support for Google Gears Above all its from the giant Google

item.title: Google Chrome : The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000005)
item.description: The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000005). Click on OK to terminate the application Symantec causes this issue and the temp.
